comment: The Cayley-Hamilton theorem: A matrix over a commutative ring "satisfies its own characteristic equation". This version of ~ cayleyhamilton provides definitions not used in the theorem itself, but in its proof to make it clearer, more readable and shorter compared with a proof without them (see ~ cayleyhamiltonALT )! (Contributed by AV, 25-Nov-2019.) (Revised by AV, 15-Dec-2019.)
